name: It's fricking raw!
description:
My game for Wowie Jam 4.0

Came here for Overcooked? Well, I will surprise you - the game you found is SO much better then the thing you've been searching for! "WOWIEEEEEEEE!" - is that your reaction? Huh, I guess I have done a really good job on making this game as much "WOWIE" as possible (jk, I just didn't have time or idea to make the game more "WOWIE", so I am just pathetically coming up with some pathetic excuses)

Important thing! To make food you need to find a zone marked with a brown line - example in the screenshots. Only in this spots you can place food

And to send food away and get points you need to put the meal in gray machine (don't know how it is called, in code I was calling it "FoodDeliverer")

Let me know if you have found any bugs that are not related to the movement of the bot.

Controls:

WASD or ARROWS - movement

Q, E, ENTER - interact

ESC - back to menu

Credits:

all credits in the game
